objective.goal: Sink all of your opponent's ships before they sink yours.

turns.action: Players take turns calling out a coordinate (e.g., 'B5') to attack.
turns.response: The opponent must declare whether the attack is a 'hit' or a 'miss.'

attack_results.hit: If the attack hits a ship, the attacking player continues until they miss or sink a ship.
attack_results.sink: A ship is sunk when all the squares it occupies are hit. The opponent must announce which ship has been sunk.

end_of_game.condition: The game ends when one player sinks all of the opponent's ships.
end_of_game.winner: The player who sinks all the opponent's ships first is declared the winner.

additional_rules: Players cannot change the position of their ships once the game starts.
A hit and miss must be marked on each player's tracking grid to keep the game organized.
